title: just linking you to a thread my friends
body:
hi, some time last year i made a time capsule post and here it is now, feel free to browse it and  have a look


http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=84031

replies.body: I thought I was too but im not :\

hi, i am sorry about this my friends, it might just be because you didnt post on it or maybe you did but with a different account? don't worry though everything will be ok, glad i could help - ur welcome
